desc: The original record player developed in the 70s, continues to be Made in Japan is now available globally. With continuing upgrades such as Magnetic cartridge, speed / volume adjustments, Bluetooth, new speaker, updated firmware, new models and much more! Enjoy and have fun on vinyl with the RECORD RUNNER ®︎

layout.text: The World's Smallest Portable Record Player
For everyone from DJs & record collectors to music lovers alike
